pages.title: The Undergarden
pages.text: Deep beneath the bedrock lies many mysterious realms. One is called The Undergarden.

To travel to The Undergarden you need to build a portal and a $(l:dimensions/undergarden#catalyst)Catalyst$(/l). The portal is built the same way as a classical Nether portal but made out of stone bricks and it's activated using the Catalyst on the bottom inner frame of the portal frame.

pages.name: portal
pages.text: To activate the portal click the inner bottom frame with a Catalyst.
